鷊字的基本解释

鷊
yì
见“鹝”。

鷊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》五歷切，入錫，疑。］
“鹝1”的繁体字。
(1)草名。绶草。
(2)鸟名。绶鸟，又名吐绶鸟。

鷊字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷊； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1498第10
【廣韻】五歷切【集韻】【韻會】倪歷切，?音逆。【玉篇】與鶂?鷁?同。【埤雅】鷊，綬鳥也。綏鳥大如鸜鵒，頭似雉，有時吐物長數寸，食必蓄嗉，臆前大如斗。【古今注】吐綬一名功曹，今俗謂之錦囊。一名辟株，行必遠草木，慮觸其嗉也。【韻會】亦曰眞珠雞，體有眞珠點文。李時珍曰：吐綬雞項有嗉囊，內藏肉綬，常時不見，春夏淸明則向日擺之，頂上先出兩翠角二寸許，乃徐舒項下綬，長闊近尺，采色煥爛，踰時悉斂，或剖視之，一無所睹。又草名。【詩·?風】中唐有甓，邛有旨鷊。【爾雅·釋草】作虉綬。【郭註】小草有雜色，似綬。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" five calendar cuts, into the tin, doubt. ]
Traditional characters for "鹝1".
(1) Cursive name. Cogwheel.
(2) The name of the bird. Cogonia, also known as spit cogtail.
鷊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷊; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1498 No. 10
[Guangyun] Five Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ni Liqie, "Yin inverse." 【Jade articles】Same as Bei? 鹢? [Piya] 鷊, the cogbird is also. The swift bird is as big as a pheasant, its head is like a pheasant, and sometimes the spit is several inches long. The food must be stored, and the front is as big as a fight. [Ancient and Modern Note] A meritorious Cao who spit the coffin is called a kit in modern folks. A cultivating plant will move far away from the grass and trees, and think about touching it. 【Rhyme Meeting】Yi said Zhuzhu Chicken, with a little bit of writing on the body. Li Shizhen said: The spit-strap chicken has a sac, and the meat-strap is hidden inside. It is often not seen. In the spring and summer, it will swing to the sun. The top comes out with two green corners and two inches. It is the silk under Xu Shu's item, which is long and wide and close to the foot. The color is radiant, and it is overdone, or it is dissected, and nothing is seen. Also cursive. [Poetry·? Wind] In the middle of the Tang Dynasty, there is a 甓, and Qiong has a purpose. 【Erya·Shucao】As a cogwheel. [Guo's Note] The grass is variegated and resembles a cogwheel.
